archimate:Requirement.name: AC-11(1): Device Lock | Pattern-hiding Displays
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Conceal, via the device lock, information previously visible on the display with a publicly viewable image.

properties.value: The pattern-hiding display can include static or dynamic images, such as patterns used with screen savers, photographicÂ images, solid colors, clock, battery life indicator, or a blank screen with the caveat that controlled unclassified information is not displayed.
